greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerator of the expected time to finish a random Tower of Hanoi problem with n disks using optimal moves.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..500
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,5,0,-4).
Index entries for sequences related to Towers of Hanoi
example: a(2)=2 since there are nine equally likely possibilities, with times required of 0,1,1,2,2,3,3,3,3 giving an average of 18/9 = 2/1.
xref: Denominator is A010684(n).  Cf. A007798, A060586, A060589, A020988 (even bisection).
results.author: _Henry Bottomley_, Apr 05 2001
